description: This file is an HTML document that provides the frontend interface for a database visualizer. It includes structure, styling, and client-side JavaScript code for interacting with backend APIs to list databases, tables, and data, and to display them dynamically.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of available databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list and resets the UI state.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show its tables and loads tables when expanded.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches table names for a selected database and displays them.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data from a selected table, limited to 50 records.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML for displaying data in a table format.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for individual cell data, handling objects, long strings, and nulls.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long strings or objects.
